content:
Hi all,
I’ve opened a PR (#34773) adding a definition of Shannon entropy for probability mass functions (PMF), along with basic properties (nonnegativity, zero iff pure, Bernoulli entropy, and uniform distributions).

I’d appreciate any feedback, especially on naming and placement.
This is my first mathlib PR, so suggestions are very welcome.
PR: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/34773
It looks quite nice, I'll have a look at it in the next few days.

Thanks for the review — I’ve pushed an update addressing the requested changes (renaming to shannonEntropy, and restructuring the uniform entropy proof via KL divergence).
I’d be grateful for any further feedback on how to improve the code.
